snippet: Amid speculation that a gang of teenagers was responsible for a shooting and a fight in Carroll Park on Monday, some residents dismissed the episodes as facts of life.
abstract: Speculation grows that gang of teenagers was responsible for shooting and fight in Carroll Park, Brooklyn; some residents worry about what it means for affluent neighborhood, but others are more apathetic, dismissing incident as merely part of life in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Amid speculation that a gang of teenagers was responsible for a shooting and a fight in Carroll Park on Monday, some residents dismissed the episodes as facts of life.

headline.main: Violence in Carroll Gardens Leads to Anxiety and Apathy
headline.print_headline: Violence in Carroll Gardens Leads to Anxiety and Apathy
